author: timw
msg: Fix header processing when ISAPI Redirector is used in extension only mode (legacy).
Redirector headers are not present when HttpFilterProc is bypassed, but the code assumes they are.

author: jleroux
msg: Fixes a NPE in GenericDispatcher.java. It's related to tenants changes. It appears when you set a jms-service: you have no delegator when you try to create a GenericMessageListener in JmsListenerFactory, but was hidden there

author: jleroux
msg: Fixes a bug in AbstractJmsListener.java. This was 1st reported by Calum Miller on user ML 3 years ago http://markmail.org/message/hb2r7vbjvekxbris. But as it seems this is no often use nobody noticed since but at least Anand H I who used the same in http://markmail.org/message/yvvm5nepopc7y246. It appeared when you tried to set a jms-service in serviceengine.xml
